svg.title: Projects gallery illustration
svg.desc: A simple set of project cards with icons and labels, representing a portfolio gallery.

g.font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Arial
g.text: A few things I built (and a few I want to build next)
